DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Asia . The aim observational study collect efficacy safety data diabetic patient acute hyperglycemia use NovoRapid™ FlexPen™ per normal clinical practice .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Assess Efficacy Safety NovoRapid™ Flexpen™
DOC.criteria: Patients diabetes mellitus ( accord product labelling ) Hypoglycaemia Hypersensitivity insulin aspart excipients ( accord product labelling )
